mapper.insert: insert into `clientexam` (client_id, exam_type_id, intention_class_id, exam_date, pass_exam, sale_man_id, input_man_id, remark1) values (#{client.id}, #{examType.id}, #{intentionClass.id}, #{examDate}, #{passExam}, #{saleMan.id}, #{inputMan.id}, #{remark1})
mapper.update: update `clientexam` set client_id = #{client.id}, exam_type_id = #{examType.id}, intention_class_id = #{intentionClass.id}, exam_date = #{examDate}, pass_exam = #{passExam}, sale_man_id = #{saleMan.id}, input_man_id = #{inputMan.id}, remark1 = #{remark1} where id = #{id}
update clientexam set pass_exam=pass_exam^1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select c.id,c.exam_date, c.remark1, client.id client_id,client.name client_name, examType.id examType_id ,examType.name examType_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id,intentionClass.name intentionClass_name from clientexam c left join client client on c.client_id = client.id left join datadictionaryitem examType on examType.id=c.exam_type_id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on intentionClass.id=c.intention_class_id where id = #{id}
select id, client_id, exam_type_id, intention_class_id, exam_date, pass_exam, sale_man_id, input_man_id, remark1 from `clientexam`

select c.id,c.exam_date, c.pass_exam, c.remark1, client.id client_id,client.name client_name, inputMan.id inputMan_id,inputMan.username inputMan_name, saleMan.id saleMan_id,saleMan.username saleMan_name, examType.id examType_id ,examType.name examType_name, intentionClass.id intentionClass_id,intentionClass.name intentionClass_name from clientexam c left join client client on c.client_id = client.id left join datadictionaryitem examType on examType.id=c.exam_type_id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on intentionClass.id=c.intention_class_id left join employee saleMan on saleMan.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee inputMan on inputMan.id=c.input_man_id limit #{startIndex},#{rows}

select count(c.id) from clientexam c left join client client on c.client_id = client.id left join datadictionaryitem examType on examType.id=c.exam_type_id left join datadictionaryitem intentionClass on intentionClass.id=c.intention_class_id left join employee saleMan on saleMan.id=c.sale_man_id left join employee inputMan on inputMan.id=c.input_man_id
